software.leonov.common.util.function

Class Unchecked

  • java.lang.Object
    • software.leonov.common.util.function.Unchecked

  • public final class Unchecked
extends Object
    Static utility methods which circumvent Java's exception handling and treat Exceptions as runtime errors.
    Author:
    Zhenya Leonov

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <E extends Exception>
      RuntimeException      		 exception(Exception e)
      Propagates the specified Exception as if it is an instance of RuntimeException without the adding bloat to the stack trace.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • exception

        public static <E extends Exception> RuntimeException exception(Exception e)
                                                        throws E extends Exception
        Propagates the specified Exception as if it is an instance of RuntimeException without the adding bloat to the stack trace.

        For example: 

         try {
     return someMethodThatCouldThrowAnything();
 } catch (final IKnowWhatToDoWithThisException e) {
     ...
 } catch (final Exception e) {
     throw Unchecked.exception(e); // propagate without wrapping in a RuntimeException 
 }
        Warning: This method circumvents Java's exception handling mechanism and can lead to horrible errors when misused. It is explicitly designed for cases where you are sure the caller will handle all possible exceptions thrown by this method. See Unchecked Java's Safety Guide before using this method. If in doubt do not use.
        Type Parameters:
        E - the type of exception to rethrow as unchecked
        Parameters:
        e - the specified exception
        Returns:
        this method does not return - the return type is only for your convenience to make the compiler happy
        Throws:
        E - always as an unchecked exception
        E extends Exception
